notice.en: Course level: intermediate to high. Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade. The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
notice.ch: 限非母語之外籍生/僑生修課，中高級課程，一、第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。二、前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。
